Ibis====A template engine for people who enjoy the simpler things in life.Features:* Django/Jinja-style syntax.* Supports looping, conditionals, filters, template inheritance.* Extensible. Easily add custom template tags and filters.* Self-contained, no dependencies. Use as a drop-in component in any project.* Public domain code. No license compatibility issues.Sample syntax::
    {% for post in posts %}
  • {{ post.title }}
    • {% endfor %}
See the `package documentation `_ or theproject's `Github homepage `_ forfurther details.
